00026 HttpRequest::HttpRequest()
00027 {}
00028 HttpRequest::HttpRequest(strVec vec,string path)
00029 {
00030         if(vec.size()!=0){
00031         this->setContent("");
00032         string conten;
00033         bool contStarts = false;
00034         for(unsigned int i=0;i<vec.size();i++)
00035         {
00036                 strVec temp,vemp,memp;
00037                 if(!contStarts && vec.at(i)=="\r")
00038                         contStarts = true;
00039                 boost::iter_split(temp, vec.at(i), boost::first_finder(": "));
00040                 if(!contStarts && temp.size()>1)
00041                 {
00042                         boost::replace_first(temp.at(1),"\r","");
00043                         if(temp.at(0)=="Host")
00044                                 this->setHost(temp.at(1));
00045                         else if(temp.at(0)=="User-Agent")
00046                                 this->setUser_agent(temp.at(1));
00047                         else if(temp.at(0)=="Accept")
00048                                 this->setAccept(temp.at(1));
00049                         else if(temp.at(0)=="Accept-Language")
00050                         {
00051                                 strVec lemp;
00052                                 this->setAccept_lang(temp.at(1));
00053                                 boost::iter_split(lemp, temp.at(1), boost::first_finder(","));
00054                                 for(unsigned int li=0;li<lemp.size();li++)
00055                                 {
00056                                         if(lemp.at(li).find(";")==string::npos && lemp.at(li)!="")
00057                                         {
00058                                                 string t = lemp.at(li);
00059                                                 size_t s = t.find_first_not_of(" ");
00060                                                 size_t e = t.find_last_not_of(" ")+1;
00061                                                 t = t.substr(s,e-s);
00062                                                 this->localeInfo.push_back(t);
00063                                         }
00064                                         else if(lemp.at(li)!="")
00065                                         {
00066                                                 string t = lemp.at(li);
00067                                                 size_t s = t.find_first_not_of(" ");
00068                                                 size_t e = t.find(";");
00069                                                 t = t.substr(s,e-s);
00070                                                 e = t.find_last_not_of(" ")+1;
00071                                                 t = t.substr(0,e);
00072                                                 this->localeInfo.push_back(t);
00073                                         }
00074                                 }
00075                                 //cout << temp.at(1) << flush;
00076                         }
00077                         else if(temp.at(0)=="Accept-Encoding")
00078                                 this->setAccept_encod(temp.at(1));
00079                         else if(temp.at(0)=="Accept-Charset")
00080                                 this->setAccept_lang(temp.at(1));
00081                         else if(temp.at(0)=="Keep-Alive")
00082                                 this->setKeep_alive(temp.at(1));
00083                         else if(temp.at(0)=="Connection")
00084                                 this->setConnection(temp.at(1));
00085                         else if(temp.at(0)=="Cache-Control")
00086                                 this->setCache_ctrl(temp.at(1));
00087                         else if(temp.at(0)=="Content-Type")
00088                         {
00089                                 this->setContent_type(temp.at(1));
00090                                 string tempi(temp.at(1));
00091                                 size_t s = tempi.find("boundary");
00092                                 if(s!=string::npos)
00093                                 {
00094                                         this->setContent_type(tempi.substr(0,s));
00095                                         tempi = tempi.substr(s);
00096                                         strVec results;
00097                                         boost::iter_split(results, tempi, boost::first_finder("="));
00098                                         if(results.size()==2)
00099                                         {
00100                                                 string bound = "--" + results.at(1).substr(0,results.at(1).length());
00101                                                 this->setContent_boundary(bound);
00102                                         }
00103                                 }
00104                         }
00105                         else if(temp.at(0)=="Content-Length")
00106                                 this->setContent_len(temp.at(1));
00107                         else if(temp.at(0)=="Referer")
00108                                 this->setReferer(temp.at(1));
00109                         else if(temp.at(0)=="Pragma")
00110                                 this->setPragma(temp.at(1));
00111                         //cout << temp.at(0) <<  "---" << temp.at(1) << flush;
00112                 }
00113                 else
00114                 {
00115                         string tem = temp.at(0);
00116                         if(!contStarts && boost::find_first(tem, "GET"))
00117                         {
00118                                 boost::replace_first(tem,"GET ","");
00119                                 this->setMethod("GET");
00120                                 boost::iter_split(vemp, tem, boost::first_finder(" "));
00121                                 if(vemp.size()==2)
00122                                 {
00123                                         //this->setUrl(vemp.at(0));
00124                                         //string pat(vemp.at(0));
00125                                         boost::replace_first(vemp.at(1),"\r","");
00126                                         this->setHttpVersion(vemp.at(1));
00127                                         boost::replace_first(vemp.at(0)," ","");
00128                                         this->setActUrl(vemp.at(0));
00129                                         boost::iter_split(memp, vemp.at(0), boost::first_finder("/"));
00130                                         int fs = vemp.at(0).find_first_of("/");
00131                                         int es = vemp.at(0).find_last_of("/");
00132                                         if(fs==es)
00133                                         {
00134                                                 this->setCntxt_root(path+"default");
00135                                                 this->setUrl(path+"default/"+vemp.at(0));
00136                                                 this->setCntxt_name("default");
00137                                                 this->setFile(vemp.at(0).substr(es+1));
00138                                         }
00139                                         else
00140                                         {
00141                                                 int ss = vemp.at(0).substr(fs+1).find("/");
00142                                                 if(ss>fs)
00143                                                 {
00144                                                         this->setCntxt_name(vemp.at(0).substr(fs+1,ss-fs));
00145                                                         this->setCntxt_root(path+this->getCntxt_name());
00146                                                         this->setUrl(path+vemp.at(0));
00147                                                         this->setFile(vemp.at(0).substr(es+1));
00148                                                 }
00149                                         }
00150                                         //cout << "\n\n\n\nmemp------" << memp.at(0) << flush;
00151                                         /*if(memp.size()>0)
00152                                         {
00153                                                 if(boost::find_first(memp.at(0), ".") || memp.at(0)=="")
00154                                                 {
00155                                                         this->setCntxt_root(path+"default");
00156                                                         this->setUrl(path+"default"+vemp.at(0));
00157                                                         this->setCntxt_name("default");
00158                                                 }
00159                                                 else
00160                                                 {
00161                                                         this->setCntxt_root(path+memp.at(0));
00162                                                         this->setUrl(path+vemp.at(0));
00163                                                         this->setCntxt_name(memp.at(0));
00164                                                 }
00165                                         }*/
00166                                 }
00167                                 //cout << memp.at(0) << flush;
00168                                 //cout << vemp.at(0) << vemp.at(1) << flush;
00169                         }
00170                         else if(!contStarts && boost::find_first(tem, "POST"))
00171                         {
00172                                 boost::replace_first(tem,"POST ","");
00173                                 this->setMethod("POST");
00174                                 boost::iter_split(vemp, tem, boost::first_finder(" "));
00175                                 if(vemp.size()==2)
00176                                 {
00177                                         //this->setUrl(vemp.at(0));
00178                                         //string pat(vemp.at(0));
00179                                         boost::replace_first(vemp.at(1),"\r","");
00180                                         this->setHttpVersion(vemp.at(1));
00181                                         boost::replace_first(vemp.at(0)," ","");
00182                                         boost::iter_split(memp, vemp.at(0), boost::first_finder("/"));
00183                                         int fs = vemp.at(0).find_first_of("/");
00184                                         int es = vemp.at(0).find_last_of("/");
00185                                         if(fs==es)
00186                                         {
00187                                                 this->setCntxt_root(path+"default");
00188                                                 this->setUrl(path+"default/"+vemp.at(0));
00189                                                 this->setCntxt_name("default");
00190                                                 this->setFile(vemp.at(0).substr(es+1));
00191                                         }
00192                                         else
00193                                         {
00194                                                 int ss = vemp.at(0).substr(fs+1).find("/");
00195                                                 if(ss>fs)
00196                                                 {
00197                                                         this->setCntxt_name(vemp.at(0).substr(fs+1,ss-fs));
00198                                                         this->setCntxt_root(path+this->getCntxt_name());
00199                                                         this->setUrl(path+vemp.at(0));
00200                                                         this->setFile(vemp.at(0).substr(es+1));
00201                                                 }
00202                                         }
00203                                         //cout << "\n\n\n\nmemp------" << memp.at(0) << flush;
00204                                         /*if(memp.size()>0)
00205                                         {
00206                                                 if(boost::find_first(memp.at(0), ".") || memp.at(0)=="")
00207                                                 {
00208                                                         this->setCntxt_root(path+"default");
00209                                                         this->setUrl(path+"default"+vemp.at(0));
00210                                                 }
00211                                                 else
00212                                                 {
00213                                                         this->setCntxt_root(memp.at(0));
00214                                                         this->setUrl(path+vemp.at(0));
00215                                                 }
00216                                         }*/
00217                                 }
00218                         }
00219                         else if(contStarts)
00220                         {
00221                                 string temp;
00222                                 if(vec.at(i).find("<?")!=string::npos && vec.at(i).find("?>")!=string::npos)
00223                                 {
00224                                         temp = vec.at(i).substr(vec.at(i).find("?>")+2);
00225                                         conten.append(temp);
00226                                 }
00227                                 else
00228                                         conten.append(vec.at(i));
00229                                 //this->content=con;
00230                         }
00231                 }
00232         }
00233         this->setContent(conten);
00234         /*if(this->getContent()!="")
00235         {
00236                 strVec params;
00237                 string content = this->getContent();
00238                 //cout << content << flush;
00239                 boost::iter_split(params, content, boost::first_finder("&"));
00240                 //cout << "\n\n\nsize: " << params.size() << flush;
00241                 for(unsigned j=0;j<params.size();j++)
00242                 {
00243                         strVec param;
00244                         //cout << params.at(j) << flush;
00245                         boost::iter_split(param, params.at(j), boost::first_finder("="));
00246                         //cout << param.size() << flush;
00247                         if(param.size()==2)
00248                         {
00249                                 string att = param.at(0);
00250                                 boost::replace_first(att,"\r","");
00251                                 boost::replace_first(att,"\t","");
00252                                 boost::replace_first(att," ","");
00253                                 //cout << "attribute:  " << param.at(0) << "\n"<< flush;
00254                                 //cout << "value: " << param.at(1) << "\n" << flush;
00255                                 this->setRequestParam(att,param.at(1));
00256                         }
00257                 }
00258         }*/
00259         if(this->getContent()!="")
00260         {
00261                 cout << this->getContent() << flush;
00262                 if(this->getContent_type().find("application/x-www-form-urlencoded")!=string::npos)
00263                 {
00264                         strVec params;
00265                         string valu(this->getContent());
00266                         boost::iter_split(params,valu , boost::first_finder("&"));
00267                         for(unsigned j=0;j<params.size();j++)
00268                         {
00269                                 strVec param;
00270                                 boost::iter_split(param, params.at(j), boost::first_finder("="));
00271                                 if(param.size()==2)
00272                                 {
00273                                         string att = param.at(0);
00274                                         boost::replace_first(att,"\r","");
00275                                         boost::replace_first(att,"\t","");
00276                                         boost::replace_first(att," ","");
00277                                         this->setRequestParam(att,param.at(1));
00278                                 }
00279                         }
00280                 }
00281                 else if(this->getContent()!="" && this->getContent_boundary()!="")
00282                 {
00283                         string delb = "\r"+this->getContent_boundary();
00284                         string delend = "\r"+this->getContent_boundary()+"--";
00285                         size_t stb = this->getContent().find_first_of(delb)+delb.length()+1;
00286                         size_t enb = this->getContent().find_last_not_of(delend);
00287                         string param_conts = this->getContent().substr(stb);
00288                         boost::replace_first(param_conts,delend,"");
00289                         param_conts = param_conts.substr(0,param_conts.length()-1);
00290                         strVec parameters;
00291                         boost::iter_split(parameters, param_conts, boost::first_finder(delb));
00292                         //cout << "Boundary: " << this->getContent_boundary() << flush;
00293                         //cout << "\nLength: " << this->getContent().length() << flush;
00294                         //cout << "\nStart End: " << stb << " " << enb << "\n" << flush;
00295                         //cout << "\nContent: " << param_conts << "\n" << flush;
00296                         for(unsigned j=0;j<parameters.size();j++)
00297                         {
00298                                 if(parameters.at(j)=="" || parameters.at(j).find_first_not_of(" ")==string::npos
00299                                                 || parameters.at(j).find_first_not_of("\r")==string::npos)
00300                                         continue;
00301                                 FormData datf;
00302                                 string parm = parameters.at(j);
00303                                 //cout << parm << "\nparm" << flush;
00304                                 size_t dis = parm.find("Content-Disposition: ");
00305                                 string cont_disp,cont_type;
00306                                 if(dis!=string::npos)
00307                                 {
00308                                         size_t dist = parm.find("Content-Type: ");
00309                                         size_t dise;
00310                                         if(dist==string::npos)
00311                                         {
00312                                                 dist = parm.find("\r\r");
00313                                                 dise = dist + 2;
00314                                                 //cout << "\ndist = npos" << flush;
00315                                         }
00316                                         else
00317                                         {
00318                                                 //parm = parm.substr(dist+14);
00319                                                 cont_type = parm.substr(dist+14,parm.find("\r\r")-(dist+14));
00320                                                 dise = parm.find("\r\r") + 2;
00321                                                 //cout << "\nctype = " << cont_type << flush;
00322                                                 //dist = dist-12;
00323                                         }
00324                                         cont_disp = parm.substr(dis+21,dist-(dis+21));
00325                                         boost::replace_first(cont_disp,"\r","");
00326                                         //cout << "\ncdisp = " << cont_disp << flush;
00327                                         //cout << "\ndise = " << dise << flush;
00328                                         parm = parm.substr(dise);
00329                                 }
00330                                 strVec parmdef;
00331                                 boost::iter_split(parmdef, cont_disp, boost::first_finder(";"));
00332                                 string key;
00333                                 for(unsigned k=0;k<parmdef.size();k++)
00334                                 {
00335                                         if(parmdef.at(k)!="" && parmdef.at(k).find("=")!=string::npos)
00336                                         {
00337                                                 size_t stpd = parmdef.at(k).find_first_not_of(" ");
00338                                                 size_t enpd = parmdef.at(k).find_last_not_of(" ");
00339                                                 //cout << "\nparmdef = " << parmdef.at(k) << flush;
00340                                                 //cout << "\nst en = " << stpd  << " " << enpd << flush;
00341                                                 string propert = parmdef.at(k).substr(stpd,enpd-stpd+1);
00342                                                 strVec proplr;
00343                                                 boost::iter_split(proplr, propert, boost::first_finder("="));
00344                                                 if(proplr.size()==2)
00345                                                 {
00346                                                         if(proplr.at(0)=="name" && proplr.at(1)!="\"\"")
00347                                                         {
00348                                                                 key = proplr.at(1);
00349                                                                 key = key.substr(key.find_first_not_of("\""),key.find_last_not_of("\"")-key.find_first_not_of("\"")+1);
00350                                                                 boost::replace_first(cont_type,"\r","");
00351                                                                 datf.type = cont_type;
00352                                                                 datf.value = parm;
00353                                                         }
00354                                                         else if(proplr.at(0)=="filename" && proplr.at(1)!="\"\"")
00355                                                         {
00356                                                                 string fna = proplr.at(1);
00357                                                                 fna = fna.substr(fna.find_first_not_of("\""),fna.find_last_not_of("\"")-fna.find_first_not_of("\"")+1);
00358                                                                 datf.fileName = fna;
00359                                                         }
00360                                                 }
00361                                         }
00362                                 }
00363                                 if(key!="")
00364                                 {
00365                                         this->setRequestParamF(key,datf);
00366                                         string hr = (key + " " + datf.type + " "+ datf.fileName+" "+ datf.value);
00367                                         //cout << hr << flush;
00368                                 }
00369                         }
00370                 }
00371 
00372         }
00373         }
00374         //cout << this->toString() << flush;
00375 }
00376 
00377 string HttpRequest::buildRequest(const char *keyc,const char *valuec)
00378 {
00379         string retval;
00380         stringstream ss;
00381         string key,value;
00382         key = keyc;
00383         value = valuec;
00384         if(key=="Host")
00385                 this->setHost(value);
00386         else if(key=="User-Agent")
00387                 this->setUser_agent(value);
00388         else if(key=="Accept")
00389                 this->setAccept(value);
00390         else if(key=="Accept-Language")
00391         {
00392                 strVec lemp;
00393                 this->setAccept_lang(value);
00394                 boost::iter_split(lemp, value, boost::first_finder(","));
00395                 for(unsigned int li=0;li<lemp.size();li++)
00396                 {
00397                         if(lemp.at(li).find(";")==string::npos && lemp.at(li)!="")
00398                         {
00399                                 string t = lemp.at(li);
00400                                 size_t s = t.find_first_not_of(" ");
00401                                 size_t e = t.find_last_not_of(" ")+1;
00402                                 t = t.substr(s,e-s);
00403                                 this->localeInfo.push_back(t);
00404                         }
00405                         else if(lemp.at(li)!="")
00406                         {
00407                                 string t = lemp.at(li);
00408                                 size_t s = t.find_first_not_of(" ");
00409                                 size_t e = t.find(";");
00410                                 t = t.substr(s,e-s);
00411                                 e = t.find_last_not_of(" ")+1;
00412                                 t = t.substr(0,e);
00413                                 this->localeInfo.push_back(t);
00414                         }
00415                 }
00416                 //cout << temp.at(1) << flush;
00417         }
00418         else if(key=="Accept-Encoding")
00419                 this->setAccept_encod(value);
00420         else if(key=="Accept-Charset")
00421                 this->setAccept_lang(value);
00422         else if(key=="Keep-Alive")
00423                 this->setKeep_alive(value);
00424         else if(key=="Connection")
00425                 this->setConnection(value);
00426         else if(key=="Cache-Control")
00427                 this->setCache_ctrl(value);
00428         else if(key=="Content-Type")
00429         {
00430                 this->setContent_type(value);
00431                 string tempi(value);
00432                 size_t s = tempi.find("boundary");
00433                 if(s!=string::npos)
00434                 {
00435                         this->setContent_type(tempi.substr(0,s));
00436                         tempi = tempi.substr(s);
00437                         strVec results;
00438                         boost::iter_split(results, tempi, boost::first_finder("="));
00439                         if(results.size()==2)
00440                         {
00441                                 string bound = "--" + results.at(1).substr(0,results.at(1).length());
00442                                 this->setContent_boundary(bound);
00443                         }
00444                 }
00445         }
00446         else if(key=="Content" && value!="")
00447         {
00448                 if((this->getContent_type().find("application/soap+xml")!=string::npos || this->getContent_type().find("text/xml")!=string::npos))
00449                 {
00450                         value = value.substr(0,value.find_last_of(">")+1);
00451                         if(value.find("<?")!=string::npos && value.find("?>")!=string::npos)
00452                         {
00453                                 value = value.substr(value.find("?>")+2);
00454                         }
00455                         this->setContent(value);
00456                 }
00457                 else if(this->getContent_type().find("application/x-www-form-urlencoded")!=string::npos)
00458                 {
00459                         strVec params;
00460                         boost::iter_split(params,value , boost::first_finder("&"));
00461                         for(unsigned j=0;j<params.size();j++)
00462                         {
00463                                 strVec param;
00464                                 boost::iter_split(param, params.at(j), boost::first_finder("="));
00465                                 if(param.size()==2)
00466                                 {
00467                                         string att = param.at(0);
00468                                         boost::replace_first(att,"\r","");
00469                                         boost::replace_first(att,"\t","");
00470                                         boost::replace_first(att," ","");
00471                                         this->setRequestParam(att,param.at(1));
00472                                 }
00473                         }
00474                 }
00475                 else
00476                 {
00477                         size_t rn = value.find_first_of("\r\n");
00478                         string h = boost::lexical_cast<string>(rn);
00479 
00480                         string boundary = this->getContent_boundary();
00481                         fprintf(stderr,boundary.c_str());
00482                         fprintf(stderr,value.c_str());
00483                         fflush(stderr);
00484 
00485                         string retval;
00486                         string delb = boundary+"\r\n";
00487                         string delend = boundary+"--\r\n";
00488                         size_t stb = value.find_first_of(delb)+delb.length();
00489                         size_t enb = value.find_last_not_of(delend);
00490                         h = boost::lexical_cast<string>(stb)+" "+boost::lexical_cast<string>(enb);
00491 
00492                         string param_conts = value.substr(stb,enb-stb-2);
00493                         strVec parameters;
00494                         boost::replace_first(value,delb,"");
00495                         boost::replace_first(value,delend,"");
00496                         delb = "\r\n"+delb;
00497                         boost::iter_split(parameters, value, boost::first_finder(delb));
00498                         retval =  "Boundary: "+ boundary + "\nLength: " ;
00499                         retval += boost::lexical_cast<string>(value.length()) +"\nStart End: "
00500                         + boost::lexical_cast<string>(stb) + " " + boost::lexical_cast<string>(enb) +"\n";
00501 
00502                         for(unsigned j=0;j<parameters.size();j++)
00503                         {
00504                                 if(parameters.at(j)=="" || parameters.at(j).find_first_not_of(" ")==string::npos
00505                                                 || parameters.at(j).find_first_not_of("\r\n")==string::npos)
00506                                         continue;
00507                                 fprintf(stderr,parameters.at(j).c_str());
00508                                 fflush(stderr);
00509                                 FormData datf;
00510                                 string parm = parameters.at(j);
00511                                 retval+= parm + "\nparm";
00512                                 size_t dis = parm.find("Content-Disposition: ");
00513                                 string cont_disp,cont_type;
00514                                 if(dis!=string::npos)
00515                                 {
00516                                         size_t dist = parm.find("Content-Type: ");
00517                                         size_t dise;
00518                                         if(dist==string::npos)
00519                                         {
00520                                                 dist = parm.find("\r\n\r\n");
00521                                                 dise = dist + 4;
00522                                         }
00523                                         else
00524                                         {
00525                                                 cont_type = parm.substr(dist+14,parm.find("\r\n\r\n")-(dist+14));
00526                                                 dise = parm.find("\r\n\r\n") + 4;
00527                                         }
00528                                         cont_disp = parm.substr(dis+21,dist-(dis+21));
00529                                         boost::replace_first(cont_disp,"\r\n","");
00530                                         retval+=  "\ncdisp = " + cont_disp;
00531                                         retval+= "\ndise = " + boost::lexical_cast<string>(dise);
00532                                         parm = parm.substr(dise);
00533                                         parm = parm.substr(0,parm.length()-1);
00534                                 }
00535                                 strVec parmdef;
00536                                 boost::iter_split(parmdef, cont_disp, boost::first_finder(";"));
00537                                 string key;
00538                                 for(unsigned k=0;k<parmdef.size();k++)
00539                                 {
00540                                         if(parmdef.at(k)!="" && parmdef.at(k).find("=")!=string::npos)
00541                                         {
00542                                                 size_t stpd = parmdef.at(k).find_first_not_of(" ");
00543                                                 size_t enpd = parmdef.at(k).find_last_not_of(" ");
00544                                                 retval+=  "\nparmdef = " + parmdef.at(k) ;
00545                                                 retval+=  "\nst en = " + boost::lexical_cast<string>(stpd)  + " " + boost::lexical_cast<string>(enpd);
00546                                                 string propert = parmdef.at(k).substr(stpd,enpd-stpd+1);
00547                                                 strVec proplr;
00548                                                 boost::iter_split(proplr, propert, boost::first_finder("="));
00549                                                 if(proplr.size()==2)
00550                                                 {
00551                                                         if(proplr.at(0)=="name" && proplr.at(1)!="\"\"")
00552                                                         {
00553                                                                 key = proplr.at(1);
00554                                                                 key = key.substr(key.find_first_not_of("\""),key.find_last_not_of("\"")-key.find_first_not_of("\"")+1);
00555                                                                 datf.type = cont_type;
00556                                                                 datf.value = parm;
00557                                                         }
00558                                                         else if(proplr.at(0)=="filename" && proplr.at(1)!="\"\"")
00559                                                         {
00560                                                                 string fna = proplr.at(1);
00561                                                                 fna = fna.substr(fna.find_first_not_of("\""),fna.find_last_not_of("\"")-fna.find_first_not_of("\"")+1);
00562                                                                 datf.fileName = fna;
00563                                                         }
00564                                                 }
00565                                         }
00566                                 }
00567                                 if(key!="")
00568                                 {
00569                                         this->setRequestParamF(key,datf);
00570                                         retval+= (key + " " + datf.type + " "+ datf.fileName+" "+ datf.value);
00571                                 }
00572                         }
00573                 }
00574 
00575         }
00576         else if(key=="Content-Length")
00577                 this->setContent_len(value);
00578         else if(key=="Referer")
00579                 this->setReferer(value);
00580         else if(key=="Pragma")
00581                 this->setPragma(value);
00582         else if(key=="Method")
00583                 this->setMethod(value);
00584         else if(key=="HttpVersion")
00585                 this->setHttpVersion(value);
00586         else if(key=="GetArguments")
00587         {
00588                 strVec params;
00589                 boost::iter_split(params, value, boost::first_finder("&"));
00590                 for(unsigned j=0;j<params.size();j++)
00591                 {
00592                         strVec param;
00593                         boost::iter_split(param, params.at(j), boost::first_finder("="));
00594                         if(param.size()==2)
00595                         {
00596                                 string att = param.at(0);
00597                                 boost::replace_first(att,"\r","");
00598                                 boost::replace_first(att,"\t","");
00599                                 boost::replace_first(att," ","");
00600                                 this->setRequestParam(att,param.at(1));
00601                         }
00602                 }
00603         }
00604         /*else if(key=="PostArguments")
00605         {
00606                 strVec params;
00607                 boost::iter_split(params, value, boost::first_finder("&"));
00608                 for(unsigned j=0;j<params.size();j++)
00609                 {
00610                         strVec param;
00611                         boost::iter_split(param, params.at(j), boost::first_finder("="));
00612                         if(param.size()==2)
00613                         {
00614                                 string att = param.at(0);
00615                                 boost::replace_first(att,"\r","");
00616                                 boost::replace_first(att,"\t","");
00617                                 boost::replace_first(att," ","");
00618                                 this->setRequestParam(att,param.at(1));
00619                         }
00620                 }
00621         }*/
00622         else if(boost::find_first(key, "URL"))
00623         {
00624                 boost::replace_first(key,"URL","");
00625                 strVec memp;
00626                 this->setActUrl(value);
00627                 boost::iter_split(memp, value, boost::first_finder("/"));
00628                 int fs = value.find_first_of("/");
00629                 int es = value.find_last_of("/");
00630                 if(fs==es)
00631                 {
00632                         this->setCntxt_root(key+"default");
00633                         this->setUrl(key+"default/"+value);
00634                         this->setCntxt_name("default");
00635                         this->setFile(value.substr(es+1));
00636                 }
00637                 else
00638                 {
00639                         int ss = value.substr(fs+1).find("/");
00640                         if(ss>fs)
00641                         {
00642                                 this->setCntxt_name(value.substr(fs+1,ss-fs));
00643                                 this->setCntxt_root(key+this->getCntxt_name());
00644                                 this->setUrl(key+value);
00645                                 this->setFile(value.substr(es+1));
00646                         }
00647                 }
00648         }
00649         return retval;
00650 }
00651 
00652 string HttpRequest::toString()
00653 {
00654         string ret;
00655         ret = "\nHost: "+this->getHost();
00656         ret += "\nAccept: "+this->getAccept();
00657         ret += "\nAccept Chars: "+this->getAccept_chars();
00658         ret += "\nAccept Encoding: "+this->getAccept_encod();
00659         ret += "\nAccept Language: "+this->getAccept_lang();
00660         ret += "\nCache Ctrl: "+this->getCache_ctrl();
00661         ret += "\nConnection: "+this->getConnection();
00662         ret += "\nContent: "+this->getContent();
00663         ret += "\nContent Length: "+this->getContent_len();
00664         ret += "\nContent Type: "+this->getContent_type();
00665         ret += "\nHttp Version: "+this->getHttpVersion();
00666         ret += "\nMethod: "+this->getMethod();
00667         ret += "\nUser agent: "+this->getUser_agent();
00668         ret += "\nUrl: "+this->getUrl();
00669         ret += "\nFile: "+this->getFile();
00670         ret += "\nContext Name: "+this->getCntxt_name();
00671         ret += "\nContext Root: "+this->getCntxt_root();
00672         ret += "\nDefault Locale: "+this->getDefaultLocale();
00673         ret += "\nContent Boundary: "+this->getContent_boundary();
00674         string vals;
00675         if(this->requestParams.size()>0)
00676         {
00677                 RMap::iterator iter;
00678                 for (iter=this->requestParams.begin();iter!=this->requestParams.end();iter++)
00679                 {
00680                         vals+= ("\nKey: "+iter->first + " Value: "+iter->second);
00681                 }
00682         }
00683         if(this->requestParamsF.size()>0)
00684         {
00685                 FMap::iterator iter;
00686                 for (iter=this->requestParamsF.begin();iter!=this->requestParamsF.end();iter++)
00687                 {
00688                         FormData dat = iter->second;
00689                         vals+= ("\nKey: "+iter->first + " Type: "+dat.type + " FileName: "+dat.fileName);
00690                         vals+= ("\nValue: "+dat.value);
00691                 }
00692         }
00693         ret += "\nRequest Parameters "+vals;//boost::lexical_cast<string>(this->getRequestParams().size());
00694         return ret;
00695 }

00919 string HttpRequest::getRequestParam(string key)
00920 {
00921         if(this->requestParams.find(key)!=this->requestParams.end())
00922                 return this->requestParams[key];
00923         else if(this->requestParamsF.find(key)!=this->requestParamsF.end())
00924                 return this->requestParamsF[key].value;
00925         else
00926                 return "";
00927 }
00928 
00929 string HttpRequest::getRequestParamType(string key)
00930 {
00931         if(this->requestParamsF.find(key)!=this->requestParamsF.end())
00932                 return this->requestParamsF[key].type;
00933         else
00934                 return "";
00935 }
00936

00938 {
00939         this->requestParams[key] = value;
00940 }

00943 {
00944         this->requestParamsF[key] = value;
00945 }

00956 string HttpRequest::getDefaultLocale()
00957 {
00958         if(this->localeInfo.size()>0)
00959                 return this->localeInfo.at(0);
00960         else
00961                 return "en";
00962 }
